title: Total War: WARHAMMER III for Mac is out now — Apple Silicon required
content:
Get ready to conquer some daemons! Total War: WARHAMMER III is out now on macOS, but only for Apple Silicon Macs with M1 chip or higher – not Intel.

more…

The post Total War: WARHAMMER III for Mac is out now — Apple Silicon required appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Total War: WARHAMMER III is out now on macOS, but only for Apple Silicon Macs – not Intel. You can buy the game on Steam.
